articles.title: Dow Jones Futures: Meta, Palantir Are Big Losers; Palo Alto Jumps On Earnings - Investor's Business Daily
articles.description: Dow Jones Futures: Meta stock and Palantir Technologies were big losers Monday, while Palo Alto jumped on earnings late.
articles.content: Information in Investors Business Daily is for informational and educational purposes only and should not be construed as an offer, recommendation, solicitation, or rating to buy or sell securities. … [+1064 chars]
